doc:
Forrest Stanley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Forrest_Stanley 0 Forrest Stanley (August 21, 1889 in New York City – August 27, 1969 in Los Angeles, California) was an American actor and screenplay writer best known for his work in silent film. He is particularly known for his role as the villain in the murder mystery film The Cat and the Canary (1927) directed by Paul Leni. Forrest_Stanley ( August_21_,_1889 in New_York_City – August_27_,_1969 in Los_Angeles , California ) was an_American_actor_and_screenplay_writer best known for his_work in silent_film . He is_particularly_known for his_role as the_villain in the_murder_mystery_film The_Cat and the_Canary_(_1927_) directed by Paul_Leni .
